name: Moving Through Life
description:
Moving Through Life is a relaxing 3D game about arranging furniture and items in different stages of life. Make choices that affect your belongings and rooms in subtle ways. Discover the story of the heroine and how your decisions shape her life.



  • You play as a girl who moves from her childhood home in the 1990s to different places as she grows up.
  • You arrange furniture and belongings in each room, making it cozy and comfortable.
  • You also make decisions that affect your life path and the environment.

Will you become a writer or an artist? Will you pursue a career or relationships? Will you pursue charity work or hobbies? Each decision will have consequences, unlock new items and features for the upcoming rooms, and ultimately affect the game's ending.



Moving Through Life is a game about nostalgia, creativity, and identity. It invites you to reflect on your own life choices and imagine different possibilities. It’s a game that celebrates the joy of moving through life.
